USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS gold.vw_trip_data
GO
CREATE VIEW gold.vw_trip_data AS  
SELECT trip_data.filepath(1) AS year, --FilePath is taking the very first thing from the filepath
        trip_data.filepath(2) AS month,  --Second thing in the filepath is month, so it is found by filepath(2)
        trip_data.*
    FROM   
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
        -- ,HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH 
    (
        borough VARCHAR(50),
        trip_day VARCHAR(50),
        trip_date VARCHAR(MAX),
        weekend_trip NVARCHAR(MAX),
        card_trips_count INT, 
        cash_trips_count INT
    ) AS [trip_data]

    --     -- AND trip_data.filepath(2) IN ('06','07','08')
